TopicTitle: Is there any easy way to clean up debris?

Articles.Content:
Lots of debris in orbit, I'd like to get rid of it but the only way I can see is selecting each one individually. Is there an easier way?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-26T05:20:37Z" title="07/26/2015 05:20  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 26, 2015</time> by Xwingace**
Are you talking about from the Tracking Station? Even with a lot of debris it shouldn't take more than a couple minutes to terminate them all from there.
Go to settings and limit debris to 0. No more debris ever again.

> 
> Go to settings and limit debris to 0. No more debris ever again.

Use the TAC Self-Destruct mod to not make any debris to being with.

But if you're stuck with it already, by far the easiest method is to "Deathstar" stuff via "this fully operatiounal battle station" aka the Tracking Station.

[![19428882178_701f19ca1b_z.jpg](https://farm1.staticflickr.com/452/19428882178_701f19ca1b_z.jpg)](https://flic.kr/p/vAS6Md)
But what if it's at the other side of the planet (blocked by Kerbin/Mun/etc.)?
